content.en: Contouring control algorithms: Researchers have developed various algorithms to improve the accuracy and performance of contouring control in motion systems. These algorithms include integrated direct/indirect adaptive robust controllers, position domain control methods, real-time contouring error estimation algorithms, and iterative learning cross-coupled control algorithms. By utilizing these algorithms, precise contour following, high-precision contouring, and improved contour accuracy can be achieved in a wide range of applications, including industrial motion stages and multi-axis motion systems.
content.da: Konturkontrolalgoritmer: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden og ydeevnen af konturkontrol i bevægelsessystemer. Disse algoritmer inkluderer integrerede direkte/indirekte adaptive robuste controllere, positionsdomænekontrolmetoder, algoritmer til realtidsestimering af konturfejl og iterative lærings cross-coupled kontrolalgoritmer. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer kan præcis konturfølgning, højpræcisionskonturering og forbedret konturnøjagtighed opnås i en bred vifte af applikationer, herunder industrielle bevægelsesplatforme og multi-akse bevægelsessystemer.
